00025 #ifndef __WIDGET_FACTORY_H__
00026 #define __WIDGET_FACTORY_H__
00027 
00028 #include "omega/ui/Button.h"
00029 #include "omega/ui/Container.h"
00030 #include "omega/ui/Slider.h"
00031 #include "omega/ui/Widget.h"
00032 #include "omega/ui/Image.h"
00033 
00034 namespace omega
00035 {
00036 namespace ui
00037 {
00039         class WidgetFactory
00040         {
00041         public:
00042                 virtual Widget* createWidget(String name, Container* container)
00043                 {
00044                         Widget* widget = onew(Widget)(name);
00045                         container->addChild(widget);
00046                         return widget;
00047                 }
00048 
00049                 virtual Button* createButton(String name, Container* container)
00050                 {
00051                         Button* button = onew(Button)(name);
00052                         container->addChild(button);
00053                         return button;
00054                 }
00055 
00056                 virtual Button* createCheckButton(String name, Container* container)
00057                 {
00058                         Button* button = createButton(name, container);
00059                         button->setCheckable(true);
00060                         return button;
00061                 }
00062 
00063                 virtual Slider* createSlider(String name, Container* container)
00064                 {
00065                         Slider* slider = onew(Slider)(name);
00066                         container->addChild(slider);
00067                         return slider;
00068                 }
00069 
00070                 virtual Image* createImage(String name, Container* container)
00071                 {
00072                         Image* image = onew(Image)(name);
00073                         container->addChild(image);
00074                         return image;
00075                 }
00076 
00077                 virtual Label* createLabel(String name, Container* container, String text = "")
00078                 {
00079                         Label* lbl = onew(Label)(name);
00080                         if(text.size()  == 0) text = name;
00081                         lbl->setText(text);
00082                         container->addChild(lbl);
00083                         return lbl;
00084                 }
00085 
00086                 virtual Container* createContainer(String name, Container* container, 
00087                         Container::Layout layout = Container::LayoutHorizontal)
00088                 {
00089                         Container* c = onew(Container)(name);
00090                         c->setLayout(layout);
00091                         container->addChild(c);
00092                         return c;
00093                 }
00094         };
00095 }; // namespace ui
00096 }; // namespace omega
00097 
00098 #endif
